title: Conan The Barbarian Basil Poledouris Varese Sarabande
description:
Conan The Barbarian Basil Poledouris Varese Sarabande Soundtrack Club (Out of Print)(Flac)

Varese Sarabande Soundtrack Club Limited to 3000 copys. No longer in print and is hard to find on CD.

[CD INFO]
1. Anvil of Crom
2. Riddle of Steel/Riders of Doom
3. Gift of Fury
4. Wheel of Pain
5. Atlantean Sword
6. Theology/Civilization
7. Wifeing "Theme of Love"
8. Leaving/The Search
9. Mountain of Power Procession
10. Tree of Woe
11. Recovery
12. Kitchen/The Orgy
13. Funeral Pyre
14. Battle of the Mounds
15. Death of Rexnor
16. Orphans of Doom/The Awakening

Music and text composed and conducted by Basil Poledouris
except "The Orgy" written by Zoe Poledouris.

Album Produced by Basil Poledouris
Orchestration by Greig McRitchie
Executive Producers John Miius and Jason E. Squire
Prepared for Release by Robert Townson
Music Performed by members of The Orchestra and Chorus of
Santa Cecilia and The Radio Symphony of Rome
Orchestra Manager Nino Dei
Text Translation Beth Lawson and Teresa Cortey
Recording and Live Mixing Engineer Pedegro Savina
International Recording Studios, Rome
Recording Re-Mixing Frack Jones, The Burbank Studios
Copyright 1982 Universal City Studios

[FLAC COMPRESSION SETTINGS]
Compression level 8

Encoded with dBpoweramp CD Ripper.
